snippet: Mr. Putin forecast that the slumping economy would soon rebound and praised efforts by Secretary of State John Kerry to find a political solution in Syria.
abstract: Russian president Vladimir V Putin is characteristically brash and mercurial in his three-hour annual news conference; enduringly popular leader offers freewheeling litany of praise and scorn on range of people and subjects, while taking pains to reassure his Russian audience that tepid economy is reviving.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Putin forecast that the slumping economy would soon rebound and praised efforts by Secretary of State John Kerry to find a political solution in Syria.

headline.main: Vladimir Putin Chides Turkey, Praises Trump and Talks Up Russia’s Economy
headline.print_headline: Putin Praises Trump and Insults Turkey at Year-End News Conference
